name: Bridge
description: Activate your core and posterior chain with a bridge. This is a great exercise to use as a warmup.

name: Chair squat
description: Squat to strengthen your legs and core, which will make everyday movements easier. Starting with a chair underneath you will help you master proper form.

name: Knee pushup
description: A beginner-style pushup, this move will help you build strength before attempting a standard pushup.

name: Stationary lunge
description: Hit your quads, hamstrings, and glutes with a stationary lunge.

name: Plank to Downward
description: This move will test your upper body, especially your shoulders. Who says you need weights for a shoulder workout?

name: Straight-leg kick
description: Build those glutes with donkey kicks.

name: Bird Dog
description: A full-body move that requires balance and stability, the Bird Dog pose is easily scalable to your ability level. Start with this version if you’re a beginner.

name: Forearm plank
description: A full-body exercise that requires strength and balance, planks put the core into overdrive.

name: Bicycle crunch
description: Although you’ll work your core with almost all of these strength exercises, a targeted ab move doesn’t hurt.
